Text:
Or this should also work... 

    Pattern.matches("\\\\[a-z]+", tag);

you can validate your expression online [here](http://www.regexr.com/)

This should work... 

    Pattern.matches("\\\\[a-z]+", tag);

[a-z] allows any character between a-z more than once and \\\\\\ allows "\\" once.

you can validate your expression online [here](http://www.regexr.com/)
